Class JLabelIcon

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZoomPanel

    public class JLabelIcon
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    JLabelIcon; an image object for easy displaying and scaling of images.
    Author:
    jwu
